response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and developed to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product offers unparalleled value and functionality, making it an indispensable asset for any business looking to enhance its operations and streamline processes. Given its exceptional quality and the benefits it provides, we believe it is worth $850,000 to ensure both parties receive fair value. We are confident that this investment will pay dividends in terms of efficiency gains and competitive advantage. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer. We look forward to the opportunity to discuss how this product can revolutionize your business.", "product_price": 850000}
